title: T206 Green Cobb FS SGC 40- Sold

posts.post_title: T206 Green Cobb FS SGC 40- Sold

posts.post_content:
SWEET CARD JOHHNY!!

did u decide to keep your psa 2 instead????????:confused:

Thanks V. I had to get rid of one of them and figured I'd try the higher grade one first. You've seen the PSA2, it's nice for the grade. If this one doesn't sell, then eventually I'll put the other one up instead but for now I'll hold on to it. Wish I could afford two green Cobbs but there is so much more I want to buy!

 Just lowered the price too in case others read this! :)
Price reduced from very good level to wow what a deal level
